wikipedia_page.main: Thomas William Roe (8 December 1900 – 1972) was an English professional footballer who played for Esperley Rovers, Willington Athletic, Durham City, Northfleet United, Tottenham Hotspur, Nottingham Forest, Luton Town, Walsall and Coventry City.

response: On June 25, 2019, The New York Times Magazine listed Tommy Roe among hundreds of artists whose material reportedly was destroyed in the 2008 Universal fire.

A resident of Atlanta, Georgia, and Beverly Hills, California, he was married to actress Josette Banzet until her death in 2020.Rebeat Magazine: "Then and Now, “Everybody” Really Loves Tommy Roe – Part Two" by Rick Simmons April 29, 2015 He has a daughter named Cynthia, three grandchildren, and three great-grandchildren who all live in Georgia.
* Tommy Roe Interview NAMM Oral History Library (2017)
